attributes.action: Recognise the people of Wooton Bassett by petitioning the Queen to allow the name to be amended to Royal Wooton Bassettt or Wooton Bassett Regis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This town has led the way in honouring the brave fallen in both the Iraq and Afghanistan conflicts and providing support for their relatives.  We the undesigned believe that this should be recognised as a reflection of the support for our service personnel and demonstrates the contract between a grateful nation and those who serve

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
